name: Additional store earnings when rounded up
instruction:
On each receipt, the store rounds the total amount up to the nearest whole number.

Write a function `roundProfit`. Function parameters:
* `totalAmount` - the total amount of the receipt;

The function should return `true` if the store made more than 60 cents on rounding, and `false` otherwise.

Function execution examples:
```javascript
roundProfit(10.10) // true
roundProfit(10.50) // false
roundProfit(10.90) // false
roundProfit(11.35) // true
```
